data.title: Saint Mary of Sorrows
data.text:
The Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary is this week and it is a Holy Day of Obligation. Our Mass schedule is as follows: the Vigil Mass is on Wednesday at 4:00pm. The feast day Masses are at 6:30am, 9:15am and 7:00pm.

Blue Bags are being collected this weekend with donations accepted in the Parish Center foyer until 1:00pm on August 11th.

Consecration program begins August 13th in preparation of our Feast Day. Pamphlets are available in the narthex.

Coat Collection is underway and coats may be left in the box in the Parish Center foyer through September 22, 2024.

Multi-Cultural Mass will be held at St. Mary’s on Friday, August 16th with Bishop Burbidge. There will be a reception in St. Joseph’s Hall. Come and experience the many expressions of faith with various cultures.

The Labor Day Picnic is coming up on Labor Day with Mass at 10:00am. The picnic fun starts at 11:00am and to volunteer please use the link http://tiny.cc/SMoSLDPicnic and join in on the fun! Picnic meeting will be held on Saturday, August 17th at 10:00am in Farrell Hall.

Interested in becoming Catholic? We will have an Interest Meeting on Thursday, August 22nd at 7:00pm in St. Joseph’s Hall. Everyone is welcome and light refreshments will be served.

Just a few catechists needed for grades K-8. If you would like additional information, please email aidaw@stmaryofsorrows.org or see the QR code in this week’s bulletin.

SAVE THE DATE: The following events are coming up. Please make note on your calendar and watch for further information in our bulletin, on our website or in future Flocknotes!!
